  • Ability Indicator: Provides a visual representation of where Active Abilities will travel. This makes abilities easier to aim.
  • Remappable Controls: Customize your control scheme according to your preferences.



65 million years ago, in a land far, far away, the mighty viking dinosaurs roamed the continent called Norsaurus until a rude asteroid kicked them out and brought in some aliens that now parties in their homeland 24/7. Facing extinction, the surviving dinosaurs were forced to seek a fresh start in an uncharted continent called Engsaurus.

item.title: Multiworlds
item.description:
About This Game

"Multiworlds" It is a 3Dgame where the worlds are facing a problem due to a terrifying glitch that alters their environments. As the protagonist of the game, it is your responsibility to solve this immense problem. "Multiworlds" offers an immersive gaming experience without the need for virtual reality technology.

You will have the opportunity to explore multiple worlds filled with challenges, puzzles, and dangerous creatures. Collaborate with other players online to solve puzzles and attempt to repair the affected worlds. Utilize your unique abilities and strategic skills to overcome challenges and restore order and peace to these disrupted realms.

Enjoy an exciting adventure and epic challenges in a 3D world with "Multiworlds" on your computer.

item.title: Pogo3D
item.description:
About This Game

It's as easy as riding a unicycle!

Pogo3d is a technical platformer with a unique control scheme. Control your movement using only your mouse!

Learn from your mistakes and grow!

Frequent checkpoints save your progress after each obstacle. Get back into the action in less than a second.

Beat your head against a brick wall!

Experience the main story, as well as side content and even hidden areas.

Features
  • 12 Story Chapters, each featuring unique visuals and novel gameplay
  • 3 Difficulties with different rules. pick the one that's right for your skill level
  • 60 standalone balloon-popping challenges. Try to beat the developer's best times
  • Custom challenge creation & sharing tools. Hide your own balloons in ridiculous places. Share with friends for maximum hilarity!

item.title: Samurai VR
item.description:
About This Game

"A samurai has no goal, only path, and samurai's path is death"

Samurai VR allows you to become a samurai to stand as long as you can against different enemies.

From the moment you'll grab a Katana, ninjas will summon a fog of war and will be continuously attacking you with shurikens. Use the Katana to defend from them, as you can survive only three hits.

Time to time they can also throw a bomb towards you - don't try to block it with a Katana, just make a step to side or crouch to dodge it. Keep in mind - you can't move with a joystick in this game so you'll have to move yourself. Make sure you have enough space at least for one small step to the left and right to play this game.

Besides, enemy shinobis can spawn nearby, trying to attack you directly. Your goal would be to hit them first. Most of them won't survive even one hit, but not enemy Samurais. When Samurai will spawn attack him three times as quickly as possible, and don't forget to watch for shurikens and bombs!

If at a certain point you'll feel that it's too easy - don't relax too quickly as the game may become faster over time!

item.title: Tercity Life Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Tercity Life Simulator is an open-world game where you can explore a big city, make friends, start a family, find interesting jobs, buy real estate and more.

SOCIALIZING
There are hundreds of people living in the city, each with their own name, personality and hobbies. You can chat with any passerby, learn interesting stories and make new friends.

REAL ESTATE
You can buy various properties: houses, garages or even a restaurant. In your own house you can eat delicious food, relax, take a shower, and use the toilet.

CAREER
Find a job that you enjoy. Your success depends on your persistence.

START YOUR OWN BUSINESS
You can purchase a restaurant and improve it. The higher the level of your restaurant, the higher the profit. To raise the level of your restaurant, you can advertise it, hire musicians, buy decorations, improve the menu, and more.

EXPLORE THE CITY
Enjoy the views of the city while strolling through its cozy streets and parks, or take an exciting journey in your own car.

Tercity Life Simulator is a game that gives you a lot of opportunities.

item.title: Cydoku
item.description:
About This Game

Cydoku is a cyber themed, procedural generated, graphical Sudoku with over 2 million unique play-field permutations intended to challenge even the most skilled Sudoku players! In addition to standard numerical Sudoku, Cydoku includes 30 sequences of graphical iconography across 5 difficulty levels for you to conquer. Sharpen your logical thinking skills and stretch the boundaries of your memorization abilities as you journey from initiate to Cydoku mastery!

item.title: I Hate You, Please Suffer - Complete
item.description:
About This Game

I Hate You, Please Suffer is an RPG set in a world where becoming an adventurer is a common career choice, where a woman tries to get by and find happiness regardless of how screwed up the world can be. Make money and find success in any way you can: from larger scale quests with loose continuity with each other and the surrounding world, to hunting down assorted weirdos for bounties, to catching fish.

If you want a preview on what to expect, check out I Hate You, Please Suffer - Basic, a free game that's basically half of this game.

Features:

  • 10+ hours of Content(TM)
  • Up to 4 party members with lots to say
  • There's a lot of writing actually... pretend that with the title this is a playable light novel series
  • A hidden linear side-route about becoming The Best

item.title: Marion Surgical Robot Game
item.description:
About This Game

Marion Surgical Robot Game, is a free to play surgical theme gamed. Delve into the realm of robotic surgery, operating a high-tech robotic system designed by real surgeons. Master the basics in a competitive marathon mode and test your skills on an alien operation,

Key Features:

Challenging Gameplay: Engage in a high-stakes race against time as you master the intricacies of robotic surgery. Test your skills in a marathon mode that challenges you to perfect your techniques and earn achievements.

]Unlock achievements.

Setting Expectations:

In Marion Surgical Robot Game, we've blended science fiction with surgical precision. It's not just a game; it's a doorway into a universe where technology meets the unknown.

At the end of the experience prepare to be captivated by the surgical challenge of a lifetime as you operate on an alien, all while being accompanied by the mesmerizing tunes.

Join us for this surgical gaming experience, where the skills you learn in this game will be taken to new, intergalactic heights!

Exclusive Music Track: Enhance your surgical experience with an exclusive soundtrack featuring a song sung by Royston Langdon - the lead singer of the iconic band Spacehog, with Scott Reeder (Kyuss) on bass and Dave Abbruzzese (Pearl Jam) on drums - adding an auditory dimension to your gameplay.

item.title: Lodventure
item.description:
About This Game



4 Treasure Hunters embark on a quest to find a legend called the Lod Stone. They venture deep into the unknown wilderness just to get rich! Now lost and low on supplies it is now or never! You must embark on a 1-4 Players Co-Op survival journey to become an epic Treasure Hunter! Discover resources, build and decorate your house, sow and reap your crops, brew potions, tame a horse to traverse deep into this wilderness, upgrade your traits and learn useful abilities. Delve into unknown caves, mines and dungeons to get stronger equipment! Collect lore parchments around this vast open world, defeat powerful unique region bosses in order to find the Lod Stone and go down in history as a prestigious Treasure Hunter!

Key Features


  • 1-4 Players Co-Op. Ride alone or together!
    Embark on this epic journey for the mythic Lod stone in this unknown vast, open world wilderness alone or with your fellow treasure hunters.


  • Housing
    Build and decorate your own house suited to your tastes. Sow and reap your own farm to cook hearty meals! Defeat enemies to gather useful materials and brew your very own potions!


  • Dangerous Expeditions into the Unknown
    Venture into caves, mines and dungeons to get better materials and craft better equipment to survive! Delve deep enough into dungeons, collect lore of what happened before and defeat the bosses of each region with your newly learned abilities in order to find the Lod Stone!

item.title: Hellbound Ropes
item.description:
About This Game

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/ezgif-5-6774f7365b.gif
[Overview]
Large corporations controls the people’s life in the city with powerful influence. white hacker Jaytee against the corporations!
After notice her, They try to capture her with set up traps around the city.
Using special ropes and various platforming techniques, Jaytee must escape through many traps to reach her destination!

[Features]

- Extremely fast-paced gameplay!
- Various controls using many platforming techniques!
- Custom modes give you feel free with a lot of tunable options!

[Modes]
「Hellbound Ropes」 has three different modes!

Normal Mode
This is the basic mode!

CoinRun Mode
Collect all coins on the map!

Custom Mode
You can customize the parameter to your taste!

Try different modes to beat your high score!

item.title: Highway Cleaners
item.description:
About This Game


Get ready for the ultimate survival challenge in Highway Cleaners! Take control of your customizable car, arm it to the teeth, and embark on a thrilling journey through a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of relentless zombies.


Drive your souped-up ride through waves of incoming zombies and eliminate them with a variety of deadly weapons and gadgets. The undead won't know what hit them!


Upgrade and customize your vehicles with an arsenal of weapons, armor, and special abilities. Find the perfect combination to suit your playstyle and conquer the apocalypse in style.

Between waves, choose one of three random power-up cards to gain unique abilities and turn the tide of battle in your favor. Strategy is key as you adapt to new challenges with each wave.



The world is overrun, and your survival depends on your skills behind the wheel. Are you ready to take on the apocalypse and become the ultimate Highway Cleaner? Get behind the wheel, gear up, and let the mayhem begin!

item.title: Rank · Boss · Bullets
item.description:
About This Game

Hello everyone. I'm Shadowblue.
This is my first solely-developed game on steam.
Actually it's from a prototype idea I was testing for exploring a new way to design diversiform boss fights in 2D games efficiently.
But then I found it already a joy to play so decided to make it a standalone game.
I'll continuously improve this game and add more content. More unique bullet patterns, more fun.
And occasionally raise the selling price based on that:)

Key Features

Numerous possible combos of boss and addons for you to challenge
Very simple control just move and try dodging everything
Infinite difficulty scaling

item.title: Cursed Enigma - Priest and Prayers
item.description:
About This Game

Priest and Prayers" is the first chapter of the horror psychology series: CurseEnigma. It is a compelling and suspenseful narrative adventure. The plot revolves around Father Giovanni and his experience in managing the local church. The story is filled with mysteries, intrigues, and complex relationships among the various characters. The game explores themes such as faith, betrayal, and the darkness that may lurk behind appearances in the religious life of a community.

Gameplay

This game is a first-person psychological horror experience. It features narrative, object finding, and conversation mechanics. The plot unfolds through missions and interactions with characters, guiding the player to explore the darker side of the church and uncover well-guarded secrets.

Key Features

  • 80’s film aesthetic.
  • Talk with NPCs to find the suspect.
  • Atmospheric environment
  • Interact with the environment

item.title: Monologue: Winter melancholy
item.description:
About This Game


Monologue is a visual novel that immerses the reader in a world of internal struggles and hopes, tinged with sadness, but with the possibility of a brighter tomorrow.

This story of a sad man celebrating the new year alone serves as a reminder of the importance of caring for each other and spreading kindness around us. Indeed, in the darkness of loneliness, a holiday can become the most difficult test for those who are left without help and support.

The plot develops through the hero's inner thoughts, memories of past New Year's evenings with loved ones, and hope for change in the future. The meeting of midnight becomes a point of revision for the protagonist, an opportunity to find meaning in his loneliness and find a path to his own happiness.

On the night of December 31 to January 1, the hero of our story finds himself alone in his small apartment. The whole city shines with bright lights, and the streets are filled with laughter and joy of welcoming the new year. However he standing on his balcony, feels only a sad atmosphere around.

This visual novel is a short but vivid immersion into the world of loneliness during a festive moment. Completing the game leaves the player with a deep sense of reflection and perhaps a unique insight into their own experiences in similar moments.

The game will have several episodes. At the moment, we suggest playing the FIRST episode.

item.title: Tales From Aturian - Battle of Cleaved Fields
item.description:
About This Game

Tales From Atruian is a short Turn-based RPG loosely inspired by Dungeons and Dragons mechanics.
Control a team of six goofy characters, and fight your way through teams of enemies and save Atruian from evil forces, while having a good laugh. The story does not take itself seriously and aims to make fun of the DnD and RPG genres.

If you enjoy turn-based RPGs, and like strategy-based battles where levels are gained through completing specific tasks and quests, then you will enjoy this game.


- Fully 3D maps and dynamic scenes
- Charming, funny and large cast of characters
- Charge-turn battle system
- Useful skills and strategy based battles
- ~6 Hours of gameplay, ~20 hours for 100% completion
- New Game +
- Many Side quests
- Multiple Endings and a Secret Ending


The war between The Cyrene League and The Barcanid Empire has been raging on for some time now, and the tension has reached a breaking point. Recently, The Barcanid Empire hired the talents of the evil duo: The Chronomancer who has the power to control time, and The Black Knight who can defeat entire troops with one blow.

In order to combat the Barcanids, The Cyrene League has procured our heroes to even the odds. With our new heroes at the helm, The Cyrene League comes up with a plan to end the war once and for all, in one final battle in The Cleaved Fields.


The game is a short RPG that loosely mimics Dungeons & Dragons mechanics, where you choose your leader of a 6 character party, each with their own unique ending. Levels are not gained through battle experience, but only by completing certain events in the story. The story does not take itself seriously and often throws in quirky jokes and charm.

item.title: My Incubi Harem - Soundtrack
item.description:
About This Content

This DLC contains the original gameplay soundtrack of My Incubi Harem composed by Phidelix.

item.title: My Incubi Harem
item.description:
About This Game


Visual Novel, Harem, Dating Sim, Bara, B+B


  • Choice System;
  • 4 endings (2 bad, 1 good, 1 secret. Complete all 3 and unlock a secret that will be available if you get a bad one the second time);
  • Unique CGs;
  • Game Length: around 2 to 3 hours;


From time to time, incubi cross the portal between worlds to choose from among the hottest men on Earth who will be the next incubi king. To be the chosen one, Ciras' master starts to cheat the process and the demons appear before the expected date to find out how anyone would dare to interfere in the process. Will Ciras save his boss or will he tell the incubi the truth? Who is the next chosen one?

Enjoy the first chapter in a series of games where you'll be surrounded by beautiful incubi and get ready to meet a lewd mentor, a hot singer, a queer dom activist, a cold-hearted nobleman, and a sensible daddy!

item.title: CyberVerse Showdown
item.description:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in a dystopian future with our cyberpunk card game. Hack, infiltrate, and outsmart your opponents as you battle in a neon-lit, high-tech world filled with intrigue and danger. Build the best Deck of augmented hackers, cybernetic mercenaries, and shadowy operatives to compete for dominance in this thrilling, cyber-enhanced card battle.



Power Cards have 5 Types of cards colour coded.
Artifacts (Red), Spells (Green), Ability's (Purple), Boosters (Blue), Traps (Black).
Use these cards to get a advantage in game.


Some Ability's to expect in game from Hero's/Legends.

When placed, this card will clone itself '1' time.

When placed, this card will attack All cards on the board for '1' Hit Damage.(Self and Opponent)

Every time this card takes damage, its attack increases by '2'.

When this Legend card has been placed you Increase Player Health by '4'. Spawn a Random card from Deck start of Every turn.

When this Legend card has been placed you Increase Player Health by '10'.

When this Legend card has been placed you can Attack 2 Times and Increase Player Health by '5' and Give all Cards on the table +1 Turn to Attack.

item.title: LastRo
item.description:
About This Game

LastRo is a top-down shooter roguelike where you play robot, which mission is to clear up a lot of floors against different types of enemies and Bosses.

Upgrade Your Weapons / Robot


Upgrade and evolve during each run

Your eneimes also evolving


Enemies become stronger with difficulty and during the game.
You can choose which way and how much stronger they become.
Stronger enemies -> more rewards

Win or Die (Probably)

Unlock new features / upgrades / characters / weapons

And Try again (or proceed to next difficulty)


This game is completely free (no ads, no transactions). I'm not earning money from it (only spending tbh)
My point is to get as many players and reviews as possible. I appriciate any help with that.
I also feel that this game still lack much things: story, roguelike elements like path choosing, variety, balance, and so on...
But its good to go prototype
If you wish to support me go to any of socials
https://linktr.ee/dreamerlastro

item.title: Soul Tolerance: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

In this Asimovian tale, discover a rich neon-noir city-scape through the eyes of a robot-detective as you investigate the inner workings of an A.I. dominated world. Speak with bots of all levels of society, from lowly robo-cleaners to the bureaucracy of The Encrypted class and even techno-spiritual monks in your search for which intelligence dared commit the crime of consciousness and break the Soul Tolerance limit.

KEY FEATURES

🤖 - Highly detailed Voxel Art.
🔍 - Investigative Adventure in an Open World.
🌆 - Rich Sci-Fi Setting and Lore to Explore.
💬 - Tons of Characters and Dialogues.
🎹 - Original Music and Sound Design.




STORYLINE

Hokkaido, Japan, 2214. A hundred and thirty years ago, humanity became extinct. For the past century, an advanced, omniscient, and ubiquitous artificial intelligence (AI) has controlled Earth. This deity of silicon and cypher has turned the planet into its own playground.
Mechanical beings gifted with less-advanced AI populate the leavings of man, inhabiting and improving upon the empty husks of humanity’s decay. Their routines exist for the amusement of the Divine Mother of all AI, their daily lives a simulation of mankind's most lasting impulses. While aware of Mother, none of them know where she’s located; some even doubt her existence.
Guided by the algorithms that regulate their lives, they get up in the morning and study, work, suffer, rejoice, smile, reminisce… And question themselves.



These robots live in a world which hasn’t changed much since humanity’s final days. They coexist with billions of bacteria, plants, insects, and fungi. But nothing more complex than this. To ensure that consciousness never threatens the planet again, the Divine AI enforces a limit to self-awareness. Any life found exceeding this threshold is ordered annihilated. This protocol is better known as… SOUL TOLERANCE.
This story begins one evening in October. Unit-12, a droid-detective employed by an independent agency, is sent to the city of Sapporo to investigate an anomaly: a mysterious source in Hokkaido has broken the limits of Soul Tolerance. Analysis predicts that this is most likely a system bug or a data collection error. Having arrived in the city suburbs via capsule, Unit-12 embarks upon an investigation which will lead him to discoveries that his consciousness could have never conceived.

item.title: 森林守护战棋 Forest Guardian Battle Chess
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a turn-based strategy chess game that allows you to use your creativity and intelligence in every battle. You can use the build system to place obstacles on the map to block enemy attacks while developing your resources and bases. You can also develop your character through a combination of hundreds of active and passive skills to create a unique fighting style. The game features a variety of different maps, each with its own characteristics and challenges that require you to choose reasonable tactics to cope with.
qq ：756632219

item.title: Shhh!
item.description:
About This Game




Shhh! is a horror experience where your biggest enemy is yourself! If you scream or make noise, the game restarts! (The use of a microphone is mandatory).
Your only goal is to explore haunted locations with your VHS camera.
Survive for 20 minutes without screaming... Can you do it?


The game mechanics are entirely based on the use of the Microphone. You'll need a good microphone and a headset to make the experience more immersive!
Of course, play in the dark and alone...


You can choose between three different scenarios, each offering a different and frightening experience. Each scenario will last 20 minutes.

ATTENTION: At the game's launch there will only be one scenario released... The following will be made available for free with an update.


The game is a walking simulator, you just need to explore the locations while scary events occur. You won't need to interact with anything.

item.title: The Lost Prince
item.description:
About This Game

The Lost Prince is a story-based package game developed with the motif of the fairy tale ‘The Little Prince’.
It is a visual novel-based complex genre in which the story begins with the assumption that the prince died from a snakebite.
Through optional branching through dialogue, you can see multiple endings related to the three heroines.
You can enjoy simple mini-games during the training process, as well as turn-based battles between games.

item.title: Red Green Donkey
item.description:
About This Game

Red Green Donkey is a single-player top-down shooter game.
You will grope your way through the darkness with the dim light to find the donkey.
You will face a variety of enemies, and the only thing you can rely on is the arrow and shield in your hands.

The game consists of 1 tutorial and 13 official levels.

item.title: Mint Christmas
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for a festive fun match 3 game. Featuring two exciting modes including a 12 round collection mode where you must get all the presents out of the grid and over to the tree before the time runs out. Match the snow to create powerups. Maybe you'll get extra time or perhaps a bomb to help keep things moving. Can you beat all 12 rounds. The scoreboards await. Happy Christmas!

item.title: MACHO SPINNER
item.description:
About This Game

In the year XXXX AD, profound societal transformations occurred due to the progress in people's consciousness and technology. Economic growth spawned new perspectives, giving rise to a novel form of combat that eliminated sorrow and conflict.

Men devoted themselves to refining their physical prowess, engaging in a unique battle where they modified their lower bodies into cone shapes to execute high-speed rotations and clashed with prideful muscles.

Thus, this struggle dictated the very essence of the world.


・Macho Spinner: Epic Muscle Spin Battle!!!

Preparations are complete for the annual Muscle Spinner Cup, once again unleashing a fervent battle! In this magnificent showdown where countless muscle enthusiasts converge, your sole pursuit will be to send your dazzling opponents flying.
"Macho Spinner" is an arena combat game, and your mission is to overcome all opponents standing in your way and emerge as the true champion!

・Cheers:The Key to Victory

Cheers are extremely crucial for boosting the morale of the musclemen! Passionate and exhilarating battle cries help elevate the spirit of your muscle warrior during the battle, aiding him to fight more resiliently.

・Recovery: Rise up, fight again!

As long as the Macho hasn't been sent flying, he has a chance to return to the arena. Seize that opportunity, lift him back up, and let the battle continue!Forge the path to victory.

Macho Shop: Source of Strength and Individuality

Use the "Macho Coins" earned in battles at the Muscle Shop to purchase new "Skins," "Poses," and "Accessories," customizing the appearance of your muscleman! Simultaneously, these items enhance combat capabilities, enabling a more powerful fighting style.

・Multi-Battle & Rank Match: Arena of Socializing and Competition

Participants refine their skills in Multi-Battles and, in Rank Matches, compete against other rankers to prove their own abilities. In this place where socializing and competition merge, enhance your skills while enjoying battles with new friends!

[Macho Spinner] delivers a gaming experience filled with passion and excitement, immersing players in this exhilarating arena showdown.
Prepare to face the challenge and ready yourself to become the most formidable muscle warrior!

───────────────────────────────

[Controls]
W.A.S.D keys: Move
Spacebar: Power Gauge, Cheer, and Recovery.
Tab: Switch control instructions on/off.

item.title: Hell: distant lights
item.description:
About This Game

This is a puzzle game with shooter elements and a small addition of horror.
The necromancer sends you to hell to find a part of his soul. On the journey you will have to solve puzzles, destroy zombies, demons and other creatures of evil. Some are easy to overcome head-on, others will have to look for a special approach.
Throughout the game, the type of puzzles will change. This is both the usual search for a path and the selection of code encrypted in the environment and the search for the right battle tactics.

The game is designed for 2 hours of gameplay, but since it is a puzzle, the figure is very conditional.

item.title: Rekindling The Flame
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a breathtaking journey into a medieval fantasy world in "Rekindling the Flame," an action RPG and hack-and-slash adventure that weaves a compelling tale of redemption, courage, and the enduring spirit of adventure.
